title: Senior Backendutvecklare (.NET/Java)
description:
På TechSeed tror vi att framtiden byggs av människor som vågar tänka längre — och av tekniken som gör det möjligt. Världen förändras snabbare än någonsin, och behovet av att kombinera affärsförståelse, digitalt ledarskap och innovativa arbetssätt med nästa generations teknik har aldrig varit större.

  

Vi befinner oss i en tid där **AI, XR, digitala tvillingar, IoT och uppkopplade ekosystem** omformar företag, industrier och hela samhällen. För oss är det här inte bara tekniska trender — det är kärnan i vårt uppdrag och den framtid vi redan bygger tillsammans med våra kunder.


TechSeed växer snabbt, och vi växer smart. Som medarbetarägt bolag formar vi själva våra satsningar och driver utvecklingen inom våra tre strategiska domäner:

* **Smart Things** – intelligenta produkter, uppkopplade system och IoT-lösningar
* **Smart Industry** – digitala tvillingar, avancerad automation och datadriven industri
* **Smart Society** – hållbar offentlig sektor, energi- och samhällssystem förstärkta av AI


Här skapar vi lösningar där teknik och människa möts — från idé till verklig påverkan. Det här är vår arena. Det här är vårt *why*. Och det är det som fyller oss med energi, varje dag.

 **Om rollen**  

  

Vi söker en eller flera **Seniora Backendutvecklare** som vill vara en del av vårt kärnteam och bidra till att bygga framtidens lösningar i skärningspunkten mellan engineering, AI, data och framtida upplevelser.


Du kommer att arbeta nära arkitekter, AI-ingenjörer, designers och våra XR-partners. Rollen passar dig som gillar att lösa komplexa problem och bygga skalbara system som gör verklig skillnad.

  

* Utveckla robusta backend-tjänster i **.NET eller Java**
* Designa API:er, integrationer och molnbaserade komponenter
* Säkerställa skalbarhet, säkerhet och kvalitet tillsammans med arkitekter
* Samarbeta med AI-teamet för att integrera intelligenta funktioner
* Bidra i prototyper inom AI/XR/data-visualisering
* Delta i kunddialoger och behovsanalys
* Påverka tekniska riktlinjer och arbetssätt

**Vem söker vi**

  

* 5+ års erfarenhet av backendutveckling
* Goda kunskaper i Azure eller annan molnplattform
* Van vid integrationer, API:er och distribuerade system
* Nyfiken på AI, data och framtida gränssnitt
* Strukturerad, lösningsorienterad och samarbetsinriktad
* Trivs i team med hög kompetens och låg prestige
* Flytande i engelska och svenska
* Tidigare konsulterfarenhet


Hos oss blir du en del av ett litet, senior team i en tidig fas — men med tydlig ambition att växa snabbt inom ett av Sveriges mest expansiva konsultbolag. Du får arbeta i skärningspunkten mellan modern engineering, AI och framtidens upplevelser, och får stort utrymme att påverka riktning, kultur och hur vi bygger teamet framåt.

 **Om TechSeed**


TechSeed är ett medarbetarägt konsultbolag i snabb tillväxt, där vi bygger framtiden tillsammans. Hos oss får du både inflytande och ägarskap — på riktigt. Vi tror på nära samarbeten, nyfikenhet och modet att skapa lösningar som gör skillnad inom **Smart Things, Smart Industry och Smart Society**.


Vi erbjuder en kultur där människor och teknik får utrymme att utvecklas, där idéer tas tillvara och där en stark gemenskap gör det naturligt att växa tillsammans. Som en del av TechSeed får du:

* **Delägarskap** och möjlighet att vara med på resan mot framtida IPO
* **Bonus** kopplat till bolagets resultat
* **Stort inflytande** i hur vi formar vår studio och vårt erbjudande
* **En öppen, inkluderande kultur** där vi utvecklas och lär av varandra
* **Möjligheten att växa** in i nya teknikområden och ansvarsroller
* **Flexibla arbetssätt** som fungerar med uppdrag och vardag
* **5 000 kr i friskvård**
* **Hälsoförsäkring**


Om du vill vara med och utveckla ett snabbt växande bolag, nära tekniken och med stort utrymme att påverka — då vill vi gärna träffa dig.

title: Game developer
description:
We are now looking for the best game developer to join us! You have the chance to be a part of creating the best casino games in the online slot industry!
   

  

**Job Description**
* Design, develop and maintain Casino Games for both desktop and mobile browsers
* The technologies you primarily will work with are HTML5, WebGL, Typescript, Pixi, GSAP and Javascript.
* In a team environment that consists of product management, graphic artistry, sound creation, server development and game mechanics, you will contribute to deliver the best casino games in the market today.
* Your main responsibilities are to make the game graphics come alive with spectacular animations, game flow, game mechanics and sounds according to a result delivered by our game servers.


 Who you are
   

  

* You are a Master Google Searcher that have Stackoverflow as your absolute favourite web site.
* You have practical experience of working with OOP in some language and you have a pragmatic approach to software development.
* Taking on technical challenges and solving them is something you take pride in.
* Quality, not only of the code you write, but the delivered system is important to you.
* You thrive in an environment where you are responsible for your code and take ownership of changes from editor to production system.


 Beneficial skills
   

  

* Working experience of mobile browsers and knowledge about their limitations and how they work in different ways is a big plus.


 Who we are
   

  

 We are the best and fastest growing slot provider in the world with the operator and product in focus, and the mobile future on our minds. Nolimit is a team of experienced professionals from the gambling industry in Stockholm, Sweden, Malta and Gurugram, India. Our company has derived from hands on work at some of the most successful gambling software providers and operators over the last 15 years. Our mission is to offer a fast, reliable and flexible team that cooperates with the best operators in the world, taking gambling to the next level.
   

  

 We have a clean code high performance modern mini/micro service portable system platform for mobile and desktop that is 100 % under our own control. Since we have our own platform, this allows us to deliver special features and smooth, customizable marketing campaigns that are tailored to the operator's specific needs. We think it's time for a new angle to the gambling software industry – one where the product is in focus and we fully engage their promotion, marketing and country manager system/activities with our games. Nolimit work with customers on a global scale and the largest gambling operators in the world have our games everywhere.
   

  

 Nolimit City, Stockholm based development team. We provide you with your choice of OS and IDE.
   

  

 Send your application to hr-sweden@nolimitcity.com
   

  

 http://www.nolimitcity.com

title: Software Engineer (frontend focused)
description:
Want to be part of this team? Of course you do! 👇🏾
   

  

 Are you a skilled Software Engineer who wants to build modern, scalable products that make a real impact on people’s health and well-being? Do you have an interest in AI and want to work at the forefront of digital health? Then OneLab might be your next adventure.
   

  

**About The Role**
 OneLab is one of the fastest-growing companies in the Nordics within SaaS and occupational health. Our platform supports over 75,000 employees and 500+ companies globally – helping organizations detect health risks early and provide medical follow-up at the right time, with the support of digital tools and AI.
   

  

 We are now looking for a Software Engineer with a strong focus on frontend to join our growing tech team. You’ll build user-facing product experiences end-to-end and collaborate closely with engineering, design, and product. While you’ll work across the stack when needed, your main impact will be shaping how our platform feels, looks, and performs for customers and end users.
   

  

**What You’ll Do**
* Build and scale our modern health-tech platform with a frontend-first focus, using TypeScript and React/Svelte (and Node.js/AWS where needed).
* Own and improve key parts of the UI and user experience: interaction design, responsiveness, accessibility, and performance.
* Collaborate with product, design, medical, sales, and customer success to deliver polished, high-impact user-facing features.
* Write clean, maintainable code and contribute to good architectural decisions — especially around frontend structure, state management, and component quality.
* Help evolve our platform with a focus on performance, reliability, and smart automation, with particular attention to web performance and frontend observability.
* Learn and apply AI-related tools and techniques where relevant — we don’t expect expertise, but curiosity and a willingness to learn are key.


**OUR STACK**
* Frontend: React, Svelte, Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS
* Backend/API: Node.js, Next.js, TypeScript, tRPC
* Database: MySQL, MongoDB,Redis
* Infrastructure: AWS, Kubernetes, Docker


**What We’re Looking For**
* A few years of experience as a frontend-heavy fullstack engineer.
* Proficiency in JavaScript/TypeScript and modern development practices.
* An interest in (or experience) with AI/ML applications is a big plus.
* A collaborative mindset and strong communication skills.
* Fluent in English (Swedish is not required).
* Experience from health-tech or related domains is a bonus, but not necessary.


**What We Offer**
* Be part of a fast-growing, mission-driven company.
* Work alongside a kind, driven, and high-performing team that values quality and impact.
* Help shape the engineering culture and product direction.
* Gain hands-on experience with AI integration in a real-world, high-impact environment.
* Hybrid setup: Work from our Stockholm HQ (next to Central Station) at least 3 days/week – with flexibility for remote work the rest of the time.


**JOIN US**
 We’re building something meaningful – not just for our customers, but for the future of preventive health. If you’re driven, curious, and want your code to make a real difference, we’d love to hear from you.

title: Software Engineer
description:
We're looking for an experience Fullstack Engineer for our client in Central Stockholm.
 



  





 This position offers a flexible hybrid work schedule of 2 days a week in office.
 



  





 You'll be working with an exciting IoT business, developing a cloud-native platform that enables intelligent, secure access to buildings. The software communicates directly with distributed edge devices, empowering commercial clients to manage building access at scale, from anywhere. As an engineer working in a small skilled team, you'll get plenty of variety on projects and take ownership over the areas you're most interested in, whether that be DevOps, Frontend, Security or Cloud.
 



  





**Requirements:-** 



* 4+ years of experience building and maintaining modern software products
* Strong backend development skills in Java and Spring Boot
* Hands-on experience with modern frontend technologies, such as React/Next.js
* Familiarity with cloud infrastructure (AWS) and distributed systems
* Curious about modern development tools and AI-assisted coding workflows
* Fluent English speaker, based in Stockholm



  





**Nice to have:-** 



* Experience working with event-driven architectures or message queues
* Experience with IoT or connected devices.
* Experience in container orchestration with Kubernetes



  





**What's on offer:-** 



* Work in a small, skilled team with direct impact on the product, users, and architecture
* A modern stack and cloud-native architecture
* Flexible hybrid work
* Competitive compensation, ITP Pension and 30 days vacation.

title: Software Engineer
description:
Visa is a world leader in payments and technology, with over 259 billion payments transactions flowing safely between consumers, merchants, financial institutions, and government entities in more than 200 countries and territories each year. Our mission is to connect the world through the most innovative, convenient, reliable, and secure payments network, enabling individuals, businesses, and economies to thrive while driven by a common purpose – to uplift everyone, everywhere by being the best way to pay and be paid.
   

  





 Make an impact with a purpose-driven industry leader. Join us today and experience Life at Visa.
   

  

  

  




**Job Description**

 Visa’s Technology Organization is a community of problem solvers and innovators reshaping the future of commerce. We operate the world’s most sophisticated processing networks capable of handling more than 65k secure transactions a second across 80M merchants, 15k Financial Institutions, and billions of everyday people. While working with us you’ll get to work on complex distributed systems and solve massive scale problems centered on new payment flows, business and data solutions, cyber security, and B2C platforms.
   

  





 The Opportunity:
   

  





 We are looking for Versatile, curious, and energetic Software Engineers who embrace solving complex challenges on a global scale. As a Visa Software Engineer, you will be an integral part of a multi-functional development team inventing, designing, building, and testing software products that reach a truly global customer base. While building components of powerful payment technology, you will get to see your efforts shaping the digital future of monetary transactions.
   

  





 The Work itself:
   

  




* Design code and systems that touch 40% of the world population while influencing Visa’s internal standards for scalability, security, and reusability
* Collaborate multi-functionally to create design artifacts and develop best-in-class software solutions for multiple Visa technical offerings
* Actively contribute to product quality improvements, valuable service technology, and new business flows in diverse agile squads
* Develop robust and scalable products intended for a myriad of customers including end-user merchants, b2b, and business to government solutions.
* Leverage innovative technologies to build the next generation of Payment Services, Transaction Platforms, Real-Time Payments, and Buy Now Pay Later Technology
* Opportunities to make a difference on a global or local scale through mentorship and continued learning opportunities



 Essential Functions:
   

  




* Demonstrates relevant technical working knowledge to understand requirements.
* Identifies and contributes to the development and solution strategies to team members that improve the design and functionality of interface features across one or more project features, under minimal guidance.
* Applies standard processes on the use of programming languages (Java, C++) to write code that fulfills website modification requests and technical requirements.
* Collaborates with others to support the piloting of new technology capabilities and features that enhance the user website experience across e-commerce products.
* Analyzes bugs for simple issues and applies debugging tools to verify assumptions.



 This is a hybrid position. Expectation of days in the office will be confirmed by your Hiring Manager.
   

  

  

  




**Qualifications**

 Basic Qualifications:
   

  




* Relevant work experience and a Bachelors degree, OR relevant work experience



 Preferred Qualifications:
   

  




* Energy and Experience: A growth mindset that is curious and passionate about technologies and enjoys challenging projects on a global scale
* Challenge the Status Quo: Comfort in pushing the boundaries, ‘hacking’ beyond traditional solutions
* Language Expertise: Expertise in one or more general development languages (e.g., Java, C#, C++)
* Builder: Experience building and deploying modern services and web applications with quality and scalability
* Learner: Constant drive to learn new technologies such as Angular, React, Kubernetes, Docker, etc.
* Partnership: Experience collaborating with Product, Test, Dev-ops, and Agile/Scrum teams



 We do not expect that any single candidate would fulfill all of these characteristics. For instance, we have exciting team members who are really focused on building scalable systems but didn’t work with payments technology or web applications before joining Visa
   

  

  

  




**Additional Information**

 Visa is an EEO Employer. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability or protected veteran status. Visa will also consider for employment qualified applicants with criminal histories in a manner consistent with EEOC guidelines and applicable local law.

title: Software Engineer
description:
Despite healthcare spending at an all-time high, patient waiting time is getting longer, and patients aren’t accessing the quality of care they deserve. At Kry, we believe we can play a fundamental role in changing this. For the past ten years, we’ve been on a journey to deliver and fix healthcare, for less.
 



 As Europe’s leading digital healthcare provider and one of the largest healthcare providers in Sweden, we believe that providing accessible and affordable healthcare has never been more important. Our vision has been consistent and clear: great healthcare for everyone. Do you share our vision and want to be part of shaping the future of healthcare?
 



  





  





**The role** 




  





 We’re looking for a Software Engineer to join our App and Web team. Our mission is to build the core capabilities that give patients a world-class experience while enabling our content editors to create high-quality, impactful content.
 



  





  





**What you will do** 
 :
 



  





 Our challenge for you
 


* Engage with cross-functional teams spanning design, development, product management, and data analysis to build impactful full-stack solutions that drive healthcare forward.
* Contribute to building and optimizing both client-side and server-side features for our applications, prioritizing seamless usability and clean APIs.
* Conduct code review process, develop comprehensive tests, and ensure software excellence through iterative improvements.
* Handle infrastructure setup and deployment pipelines with AWS, GitHub Actions, and Terraform.
* Actively engage in technical discussions and information-sharing sessions to support solution optimization.
* Participate in an agile, lightweight Scrum process focused on optimizing tools and workflows to ensure a productive and engaging work environment.
* Is some of this new to you? That’s OK! We believe that great engineer can pick up new technologies quickly and we provide support to learn on the job.



  





  





**Who you are :** 




  





 Your profile and skills
 


* Experience working with Java and React (Kotlin is a bonus).
* Strong understanding of modern JavaScript, TypeScript, and CSS.
* Strong understanding of developing cloud-based applications (AWS, Terraform).
* You have experience with web and/or mobile facing clients.
* You have worked in an agile environment using scrum.
* You want to change the healthcare system by using your passion for tech.
* You like the idea of working in a fast-moving environment.
* You are confident working on a range of languages and frameworks and can quickly adapt to new ones.
* You are familiar with development tools and concepts such as Git and continuous integration/delivery.
* Comfortable working in the English language (written and verbal).



 It is not essential to have all these skills, but an aptitude and willingness to develop those you don’t know is key.
 



  





  





**What’s in it for you ?** 




  




* Amazing, friendly, smart colleagues from all over the world.
* The opportunity to grow and learn from knowledgeable co-workers and cross-collaboration across departments.
* Ability to have a big impact on what we build and how we build it.
* As a team, committing to goals, sharing both success and failures.
* The chance to be a part of the journey of building the future of healthcare.
* Committed to supporting a balanced approach to work and personal life.



  





  





**Join us and shape your future as well as ours !** 




  





 If you think you’re up to the challenge, come and help us to grow, innovate and develop! A diverse workforce is an absolute necessity for anyone with a vision like ours: to provide great healthcare for everyone. Therefore we celebrate differences and are committed to creating an inclusive environment where all employees can truly belong and thrive. We offer a hybrid way of working where we aim to be at our great office at least 3 days a week to cater for a great relationship with our colleagues.
 



  





  





**About Kry/Livi** 




  





 Kry/Livi is the European leader in digital healthcare, allowing patients to see a doctor, nurse, or psychologist online within minutes. We also combine digital with physical care, transforming how millions of patients access healthcare. Headquartered in Stockholm, we are committed to improving the world’s health through innovation, one patient at a time. In Sweden and Norway we are called Kry. In the UK and France, we operate under the name Livi.
 



  





  





**Submissions and Questions** 




  





 Please submit your application by including your CV or LinkedIn. No submission will be accepted via email, nor when the job posting has become inactive. All applications must go via the careers site or an official Kry / Livi job post. If you have any questions regarding jobs or our recruitment process, please read our FAQ.

title: Creative Developers
description:
*MSAB is a global leader in digital forensic technology for mobile device examination and analysis. The MSAB vision is to empower every investigation with digital forensic solutions – for a safer world. A core value is to run an ethics-driven company with innovation and results. The sole focus of MSAB is on delivering high quality digital forensic solutions to collect, review, analyze and manage data. MSAB is a trusted partner to Law Enforcement, Defence Forces, Government Agencies and Forensic Laboratories in democratic countries throughout the world enabling them to investigate crime, gather intelligence, investigate fraud and fight corruption.*
 We love creating great code that matters - and the people who write it. We are always on the look-out for coders skilled in C++ or C# with innovative mindset.
   

  

 If you want to use your coding expertise and problem-solving mindset to make the world more transparent, safer, and more democratic? At MSAB, you can turn that ambition into reality.
   

  

 We’re a global leader in digital forensics, building advanced tools used worldwide to solve crimes, fight corruption, investigate fraud, and support justice. Here, your code has real-world impact.
   

  

**Possibilities**
 As a developer at MSAB, you’ll dive deep into complex and highly technical challenges - exactly the kind that motivate curious, inventive engineers.
   

  

**Your Work Might Involve**
* Extracting and decrypting data from mobile devices
* Writing decoders, parsers, and low-level implementations
* Reverse-engineering apps and making complex data structures readable
* Implementing efficient, high-performance code in C++
* Working close to hardware, embedded systems, Android, or iOS internals


 If that excites you - you’re exactly who we want to meet.
   

  

**Our Culture**
 Our culture is friendly, supportive, and built on shared learning and technical curiosity. You’ll thrive here if you enjoy autonomy, like exploring new ideas, and want to grow by stepping outside your comfort zone.
   

  

 There’s much more to tell you about our tech stack, vision, innovation and ways of working, and the opportunities ahead. But let’s save that for future conversations.
   

  

 Ready to build software that makes a real difference?
   

  

 Send your application today.
   

  

 For more information about MSAB, please visit: http://www.msab.com
   

  

 What we can offer
   

  

 Create a safer world with us!
   

  

 As one of the world’s leading digital forensics companies, MSAB leads the way in pioneering advancements that contribute to making our world safer.
   

  

 Your work at MSAB will bridge the gap between technology and justice. You will be inspired to go beyond your comfort zone, and you will deal with challenging and meaningful projects. When you join us, you become part of a global team that aspires to create a safer digital future, one breakthrough at a time.
   

  

 We can offer you an exciting work environment, where we value being innovative, acting ethically and delivering results in everything we do while our customers' needs are at the center. We are proud to be a fast-growing international company with more than 20+ nationalities and we work with things that really make a difference.
   

  

 Every day at MSAB is an opportunity to redefine the future of digital forensics.
   

  

 Are you up for the challenge?
   

  

 Department Development Locations Stockholm, Sweden Remote status Hybrid

title: Software Engineer - Java
description:
Visa is a world leader in payments and technology, with over 259 billion payments transactions flowing safely between consumers, merchants, financial institutions, and government entities in more than 200 countries and territories each year. Our mission is to connect the world through the most innovative, convenient, reliable, and secure payments network, enabling individuals, businesses, and economies to thrive while driven by a common purpose – to uplift everyone, everywhere by being the best way to pay and be paid.
   

  





 Make an impact with a purpose-driven industry leader. Join us today and experience Life at Visa.
   

  

  

  




**Job Description**

 Tink was founded in 2012, and a decade later became part of Visa in 2022. Tink was created with the aim of changing the banking industry for the better. We have built Europe’s most robust open banking platform – with the broadest, deepest connectivity and powerful services that create value out of the financial data. We offer the tools that allow anyone – from big banks and fintechs to startups – to build the future of financial services across Europe.
   

  





 Tink is building an open banking platform that enables banks, fintechs and startups to develop data-driven financial services. Through one API, Tink allows customers to access aggregated financial data, initiate payments, enrich transactions and build personal finance management tools. Tink connects to more than 3,400 banks that reach over 250 million bank customers across Europe. Our solutions are ready-to-go products, each developed to solve specific problems and bring value to both businesses and their customers.
   

  





 We are looking for a Software Engineer to join our Engineering Foundations area. Engineering Foundations builds the infrastructure and services that all other teams at Tink use everyday. This is the Developer Platform that Tink’s engineers use to ship products, and we make sure they can scale in a reliable and performant way.
   

  





 The teams in Engineering Foundations have ownership of common infrastructure allowing teams to focus on shipping business features. Our problem domains range from message queues and observability to exposing APIs to the internet, building and testing our services as well as providing a stable and flexible runtime environment or scalable data stores.
   

  





 What you will do
   

  




* Work with high load systems with high uptime requirements.
* Work with Tink’s technologies which is mainly Java, Go, AWS, Kubernetes, Docker, SQL, Datadog and much more.
* Help your and other teams think about fun things like error budgets, SLI/SLOs, service capacity planning and demand forecasting.



 What we offer you
   

  





 Tink offers you a dynamic work environment where you can grow and develop your engineering skills, with opportunities for career advancement. You will have the opportunity to work with cutting-edge technology and innovative solutions. This together with a team of experienced professionals who are passionate about creating products that make a difference.
   

  





 Through our yearly salary review we make sure to keep Tinkers’ salaries adjusted to market trends and inflation. Our employees don’t need to change jobs in order to get a fair salary increase. Together with your manager you will create personal development plans and review twice a year so that everyone has a chance to discuss their opportunities, growth and potential.
   

  





 This is a hybrid position. Expectation of days in office will be confirmed by your hiring manager.
   

  





  

  

  

  




**Qualifications**

 Basic Qualifications
   

  

 -2+ years of relevant work experience with a Bachelor’s Degree OR 5+ years of relevant work experience.
   

  

  

  

 Preferred Qualifications
   

  

 -We are looking for a committed Software Engineer who wishes to progress your career in a fast moving, international company. You’re keen to work in a collaborative, honest and agile environment. You also invest time in your own, and the team's development to build up your overall knowledge.
   

  

 We would like you to have
   

  

 - Some experience on a similar position.
   

  

 - Backend development experience in Java or Go.
   

  

 - Experience with cloud technologies, terraform tooling and Kubernetes.
   

  

 - Experience in CI/CD is a big plus.
   

  

 - Experience with a fast-paced environment that is product centric.
   

  

 - Experience working with agile methodologies and understand the value of tracking engineering key metrics.
   

  

 You might also have experience from working with
   

  

 - Distributed systems.
   

  

 - Infrastructure as Code (we use Terraform).
   

  

 - Observability technologies (eg. Datadog).
   

  

 - SRE practices.
   

  

 - Traffic routing / Service meshes.
   

  

 - Authentication and Authorisation platforms.
   

  

  

  




**Additional Information**

  

  





 Visa is an EEO Employer. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability or protected veteran status. Visa will also consider for employment qualified applicants with criminal histories in a manner consistent with EEOC guidelines and applicable local law.
