title: Receptionist Scandic Infra City
description:
\*\*Scandic Infra City\*\* ligger en kvart ifrån Arlanda och är Nordens ledande kongress- och möteshotell, som dessutom har en egen inomhusträdgård. Vårt främsta fokus är konferens, event och mässor, vilket innebär en stor variation av gäster och besökare. Vi erbjuder våra medarbetare en rolig och utmanande arbetsplats i en unik hotellmiljö. Delar du vår passion för unika upplevelser? Då är du den vi söker!


**Nu söker vi en Receptionist till Scandic Infra City.**



Oavsett varför gästen kommer till oss är det få saker som är så uppskattade som ett vänligt ansikte som hälsar välkommen. Du agerar värd tillsammans med övriga teamet på hotellet och skapar en gästupplevelse i världsklass.



Hos oss får du ta ett stort eget ansvar för att ta de beslut som krävs för att göra gästen nöjd och teamen utvecklar och förbättrar arbetssätt och service i takt med att omvärlden förändras. Vi är nämligen övertygade om att det är när du får utvecklas och bidra med all din kompetens och erfarenhet som vi överträffar gästens förväntningar. På köpet får vi kul på jobbet!



Så ta med dig dina erfarenheter, ditt engagemang och ditt sätt att tänka till oss – och bidra till en kultur där vi bryr oss på riktigt: om varandra, våra gäster och vår planet. Välkommen till Scandic!


**Vad innebär rollen?**



Du som arbetar i receptionen är ansvarig för att våra gäster får service i världsklass. Du är spindeln i nätet som ser till att gästen alltid är i fokus. Du är den som går igenom ankomstlistan och lägger tid på detaljerna. Ser till att gästens önskemål uppfylls. Du har alltid ett leende på läpparna och en kreativ lösning i bakfickan. Du löser det mesta och är en stjärna på att vända en missnöjd gäst till en nöjd gäst. Din arbetsplats är vår lobby. För det är där du möter flest gäster. I ansvarsområdet ingår även administrativt arbete, säkerhetsarbete och arbete med försäljning.


Arbetet i receptionen innebär att checka in och ut hotellets gäster, hälsa välkommen och ge gästen den information den behöver om sin vistelse. Du hanterar bokningar i systemet Opera Cloud och hanterar administrativa uppgifter runt gäster och säkerhet. Allt arbete sker med gästnöjdhet och försäljning i fokus.


Hotellet har öppet dygnet runt och det är därför viktigt att du trivs med att arbeta i skift (förmiddagar, eftermiddagar och helger).


**Vem är du?**



För att passa i rollen tror vi att du har en väl utvecklad social förmåga och är kapabel att hantera att det händer många olika saker samtidigt. Det är mycket viktigt att du kan förmedla ett gott värdskap till hotellets gäster.



Du har också vana och kunskap i att arbeta med dator som arbetsredskap.


Eftersom arbetet till stor del består av att kommunicera med gäster är goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska en förutsättning. Talar du ytterligare ett språk är det meriterande.


Allra viktigast är dock dina personliga egenskaper och din inställning. För att passa i rollen behöver du vara en lyhörd och prestigelös lagspelare som tar ett stort ansvar för dina arbetsuppgifter och helhetsresultatet.


**Information om tjänsten**



Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning på deltid med 6 månaders provanställning. Vi tillämpar även kollektivavtal.



Vi tar enbart emot ansökningar via vår hemsida. Alla ansökningar kommer att behandlas löpande och tjänsten kan tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdag, varför vi ber dig att ansöka så snart som möjligt. I denna rekrytering använder vi oss av ett enklare test om service vid urvalet.



Vi ser fram emot att välkomna dig till oss på Scandic!



Ps. på vår hemsida kan du läsa mer om vår kultur, vad tjänsten innebär och om våra förmåner!


  
**Vi har riktigt bra förmåner**
-------------------------------

Rabatt när du äter, dricker och övernattar hos oss


Family & Friends rabatt för din familj och vänner


Rabatt hos våra partnerföretag


Pension & försäkringar enligt kollektivavtal


Friskvårdsbidrag


Utbildning och utveckling via interna plattformar


  
Vi når längre när olikheter bejakas. Hos oss får du utrymme att vara dig själv och utvecklas i den riktning du vill, med trygga villkor och schyssta avtal som grund. Ta med dig dina erfarenheter, ditt engagemang och ditt sätt att tänka till oss - bidra till en kultur där vi bryr oss på riktigt: om varandra, våra gäster och vår planet. Välkommen till Scandic.



Delar du våra värderingar?


**BE A PRO** **BE YOU** **BE CARING** **BE BOLD**

  

  

Enable "functional cookies" to watch the video


...uppmuntrar alla att göra skillnad för miljön och att det var en av våra kollegor inom housekeeping som kom på idén om ”häng-upp-handduken”.
...i Sverige blivit rankad som besöksnäringens mest attraktiva arbetsgivare två år i rad, i Visitas årliga undersökning.

title: Senior Test Automation Engineer
description:
At Together Tech, we develop tech solutions! We foster an inclusive and dynamic workplace and encourage our employees to combine the strong technical knowledge with the desire to push boundaries for creating a better tomorrow.
  
Join our Mobility team as a Senior Test Automation Engineer and take a central role in shaping the future of next-generation digital and connected vehicle solutions. You will work in long-term assignments with our leading automotive clients, contributing to system quality, test automation, and innovation. In this role, you will collaborate closely with skilled teams, drive improvements across complex systems, and ensure high standards in every phase of the development lifecycle. Your Responsibilities:
  
Develop and drive test automation strategies with a focus on agile principles and methodologies.
  
Create and maintain frameworks to automate manual tests, including exploratory testing, integration tests, and UI tests.
  
Investigate and troubleshoot issues across systems, integrations, and APIs.
  
Contribute to the improvement of monitoring and quality assurance processes for existing services.
  
Support CI/CD pipelines, including automated testing in environments.
  
Drive quality across microservices, API, and cloud-based services
  
  

Your technical bakgrund
  
Master's/Bachelor’s degree in computer science or a related field.
  
At least 5 years of hands-on experience in system testing or similar roles, with a strong background in digital services and microservices architectures.
  
Expertise in automation frameworks and API testing(e.g., Insomnia, Postman), and experience with UI test automation tools such as Cypress, Playwright or Selenium
  
Strong programming skills in Java (skills in TypeScript, HTML, CSS, and Python are a plus)
  
Experience with cloud platforms such as AWS or Azure (Terraform and CloudFormation are a plus).
  
Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines e.g., Jenkins, GitHub.
  
Experience with Docker and containerized environments (Kubernetes is a plus).
  
Good command of written and spoken English, Swedish is a plus.
  
  

Your personal characteristics Being a consultant puts extra light on having a flexible and curious mindset, a self-reliant way of working and your capability to build strong relationships with customers and colleagues, while keeping track of the target picture. You stay current with industry trends and emerging technologies and are motivated to develop together with us.
  
  

Together Tech for sustainability We provide opportunities for development through a variety of assignments in different industries, whether it be client projects or in one of our exciting in-house projects. At Together Tech, you work together with other engineers who are passionate about the environment and sustainability, all with a desire to create lasting solutions using technology - or as we say: Better World Tech!
  
Your development & our support
  
Your development and well-being are important to us, and Together Tech offers benefits that support you and your career in the best way. We value the importance of secure employment and fixed salary, and we have a collective agreement. We prioritize your health and provide a wellness allowance of 4000 SEK per year. Moreover, we offer health check-ups, contributions to activities, and wellness discounts.
  
We enjoy spending time together through various social activities and team-building activities suitable for everyone! From after-works and sport activities to pentathlons and corporate conferences. Our commitment is to give you great conditions to grow through various assignments and projects as well as individual development plans. We also offer courses in sustainability and other courses within the framework of your role and goals. We take pride in being recognized as one of Sweden's most attractive employers in 2024, 2025 and 2026 by Karriärföretagen!
  
  

Learn more about us at www.togethertech.com.
  
For questions regarding the position, please contact Consultant Manager Claes Jonsson, on +46700 889 729.

title: Senior Data Scientist
description:
##### **Create Your Better Tomorrow**


With over 50 years of experience in the industry, Kollmorgen, a Regal Rexnord brand, is a technology leader in navigation and fleet control of automated guided vehicles (AGVs) and autonomous mobile robots (AMRs). In our continued effort to innovate and grow, we are now expanding and are seeking talents to join us and be part of our success story.


Our definition of success goes beyond customer satisfaction; it includes fostering the talent of tomorrow. At Kollmorgen, we cultivate a collaborative and inclusive environment where innovation thrives and every individual is valued. Our commitment to professional growth and development ensures that you will have the opportunity to advance your career while working on cutting-edge automation solutions.

  




##### **We are looking for a Senior Data Scientist to be part of a dynamic team that is passionate about making a difference in the world of mobile robots.**

##### **Position Overview**


As a Senior Data Scientist, you will be part of our Engineering department, along with 80+ other engineers working within embedded systems, system software as well as windows applications and web services.


You will play a key role in the Operation & Visualization Team, developing tools that provide real-time insights into the fleet of mobile robots. Our goal is to help customers understand how their system behaves and why, to ensure we deliver on their expectations of a robust, efficient, and 24/7 intralogistics solution.


Your main mission is to drive our data science efforts by using data to generate insights, optimize product performance, and inspire innovation. As a Senior Data Scientist, you will be the thought leader of data and AI strategy in the company. You will guide us towards becoming a data-driven organization. In addition, you will champion the adoption of Generative AI technologies in our solutions.


##### **What does success look like in this position:**

* **Data Science** **Advancement:** Establish and drive data science practices within the organization.
* **AI Leadership:** Drive AI initiatives, ensuring successful implementation and measurable impact.
* **High Impact Insights:** Generate actionable insights from data that influence business decisions and product development.
* **Robust Models:** Design and implement statistical and machine learning models that deliver value to our stakeholders and customers.
* **Driving Innovation:** Leverage data to accelerate innovation and generate impactful ideas.
* **Cross-Functional Collaboration:** Work closely with cross-functional teams to transform these ideas into real, user-focused features.
* **Adaptability:** Thrive in an evolving environment.

##### **To achieve the mission and success of this position, we believe you already have:**

* University degree in Applied Mathematics, Statistics, Computer Science, or related fields.
* At least 5 years of experience working as a Data Scientist, preferably with a software development background.
* Experience designing and implementing statistical models in production-grade software.
* Proven track record of driving AI strategy and implementing AI solutions.
* Ability to think strategically and envision future possibilities.
* Excellent communication skills in English, and preferably in Swedish.
* Experience in stakeholder management.
* Dedication to challenging the status quo to create breakthrough innovations.

##### **Technologies:**

* **Analytics**: Python (pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib/Plotly, Statsmodels/scikit-learn, PyTorch).
* **Data:** SQL and NoSQL; strong understanding of data modeling, data transformation, and data quality principles.
* **Cloud:** Azure (preferred); experience collaborating on cloud-based analytics and data access.
* **Generative AI:** Solid understanding of Generative AI principles, knowledge of relevant frameworks (LangChain), NLP tools (NLTK), and integration with LLM APIs (e.g., OpenAI API).
* **Nice-to-have:** Ability to contribute to production software (C#/React) is appreciated.


We see that our ideal candidates are committed to personal & professional growth, and they share our core values and genuine enthusiasm for innovation.

  


##### **Additional Information**


Full time employment | Based in Mölndal, Sweden

  

Selection takes place on an ongoing basis, so be sure to apply early. We're excited to hear from you!


Please submit your application in English.

##### **Kollmorgen - Autonomous Mobile Solutions**


We offer a complete automation solution for AGV and AMR providers. Our NDC Solutions platform is a proven platform that enables efficient and reliable vehicle automation with increased performance. It includes all hardware, software, and navigation technologies necessary to automate a vehicle fleet. The platform has been installed in a vast variety of material handling sites and vehicles across the globe.

title: Partner Director
description:
**Introducing evroc**


At evroc, we are building a secure, sovereign, and sustainable hyperscale cloud to reimagine the digital future of Europe. By joining our company, you have an exciting opportunity to contribute to the development of next-generation cloud services. We are seeking intellectually curious and highly motivated team members who are ready to embrace the thrilling challenge of building the first European owned hyperscale cloud.

**Location:** Stockholm or London

**Job type:** Permanent position

**Join the Pioneers**


We’re looking for a strategic Partner Director to build and scale one of evroc’s most important partnerships in Europe. Reporting to the Vice President of Partnerships & Alliances, you will define the partnership vision, establish a joint sales and marketing motion, and shape initiatives that address sovereignty challenges across governments, critical infrastructure sectors, and enterprise customers.


In this role, you will collaborate closely with partner executives, evroc leadership, product and engineering teams to co-create new solutions, drive adoption of evroc’s sovereign cloud, and unlock ecosystem opportunities that amplify long-term impact. This is a rare opportunity to influence Europe’s cloud landscape at a foundational level.

**What You’ll Tackle**

* Define and execute the strategic partnership plan, ensuring alignment with evroc leadership and partner executives.
* Build and lead a dedicated partnership sales and marketing motion across European markets.
* Drive joint pipeline generation, co-selling, business development and co-marketing initiatives.
* Work with product and engineering teams to co-develop offerings, integrations and services that meet sovereignty and compliance needs.
* Lead strategic joint programmes that address sovereignty requirements across public and private-sector industries.
* Structure partnership agreements, incentive models and joint business plans; set long-term growth targets.
* Recruit, mentor and grow a high-performing partnership team; serve as the internal advocate for the partnership.
* Represent evroc and the partnership ecosystem at industry events and contribute to Europe’s sovereignty dialogue.

**Skills We Value**

* 10+ years of experience building and scaling technology partnerships or channel programmes in cloud, SaaS or related industries.
* Proven ability to shape partnership strategy and turn it into measurable growth and market impact.
* Strong relationship leadership skills with the ability to influence C-suite stakeholders.
* Experience negotiating complex partnership agreements and leading high-performing teams.
* Solid understanding of cloud technologies, integrations and technical ecosystems.
* Excellent communication and cross-functional collaboration skills.

**Why Join evroc?**


We offer a competitive salary and an equity package to attract the best. Whether it’s the cosmopolitan allure of London, the vibrant Stockholm, or the Mediterranean charm of Sophia Antipolis, you’re poised for an inspiring work environment and a captivating local culture!


At evroc, diversity is our strength. We champion an inclusive environment where every background - ethnicity, age, gender identity, beliefs, and culture - is celebrated.


Applicants must possess a valid work permit.

title: Platform Engineer IAM (GCP) - Svenska Spel
description:
**Platform Engineer IAM (GCP) - Svenska Spel**
==============================================


Sista ansökningsdag:


2025-12-16

 **Placeringsort:**


Stockholm/Visby - Hybrid

**Avtalsperiod:**


2026-02-01 - 1 år med option på förlängning

**Omfattning:**


35h/vecka

 **Uppdragsbeskrivning:**


Svenska Spel söker nu konsultstöd i form av en Platform Engineer IAM vår domän CPS. Din huvudsakliga uppgift blir att bidra i vårt IAM-team och deras uppsättning och migrering till GCP.
Konsulten kommer även att spela en viktig roll i uppbyggnaden av våra interna plattformar, Termit och ITS. Rollen innebär både praktisk implementering och aktiv kompetensdelning inom organisationen.
För att lyckas i denna roll och i detta uppdrag behöver konsulten även kunna demonstrera följande färdigheter:
• Utvecklad initiativförmåga och ett proaktivt arbetssätt
• Förmåga att förmedla teknik, mål och utmaningar på ett pedagogiskt sätt
• Självgående och god förmåga att planera och styra sitt eget arbete framåt
• Leveransfokuserad med förmåga att arbeta enligt överenskomna leveranser med hög kvalitet som möter överenskomna leveransdatum.

**Obligatoriska krav:**

* + Minst två (2) års erfarenhet av att ha arbetat som molntekniker, eller motsvarande inom molnplattformen GCP.
* + Minst ett (1) tidigare uppdrag från att ha arbetat i en produktionsmiljö med molnplattformen GCP.
* + Minst ett (1) tidigare uppdrag från att ha arbetat i en produktionsmiljö med OpenID connect (OICD)
* + Minst ett (1) tidigare uppdrag från att ha arbetat i en produktionsmiljö med Oauth 2.0
* + Relevant akademisk utbildning eller annan dokumenterad kunskap inhämtad genom utbildningar, certifieringar eller erfarenhet.
* + God förmåga att uttrycka sig på svenska och engelska i tal och skrift.

**Mervärdeskrav:**

* + Minst ett (1) tidigare uppdrag inom cloudmigrering alternativ nyuppsättning av cloudmiljö såsom landingzone mm.
* + Erfarenhet och kunskap inom IaC och gärna cloud build.
* + Erfarenhet av att arbeta med Kubernetes
* + Erfarenhet av att arbeta med Envoy
* + Erfarenhet av att arbeta med EntraId
* + Minst ett (1) tidigare uppdrag från att ha arbetat i en produktionsmiljö med Kong Gateway.
* + Erfarenhet av att arbeta med moderna säkerhetsprinciper som Zero Trust, Spiffe Least Privelege eller DevSecOps.
* + Erfarenhet av mer än ett (1) tidigare uppdrag av att ha arbetat med komplexa och transaktionsintensiva IT-miljöer mot B2C (som exempelvis inom detaljhandel, bank eller finans), med höga krav på tillgänglighet, konfidentialitet, riktighet, spårbarhet och tillgänglighet.

title: Inventory Planner/Analyst Professional
description:
**We are looking for an Inventory Planner/Analyst for a global company in Gothenburg. Start is January 12th, 6 months contract to begin with. This role is 100% onsite in Gothenburg.**


Our client’s Service Market Logistics (SML) organization is part of their Trucks Operations division. They serve all brands and business areas by managing and optimizing service parts availability and distribution to secure customer uptime. Together, they unlock the full potential of the service business — evolving beyond logistics. Their focus is clear: to deliver customer impact, enable uptime, and support service growth across all brands and business areas.


At the heart of every delivery, every repair, and every moment of uptime is something more than service; it’s a shared spirit that unites people across the globe. From planners to drivers, technicians to teams behind the scenes, they keep the world in motion, with *Service at Heart.*


Supply Chain Optimization is a global team of roughly 115 people who plan the service market supply networks all the way from supplier to dealer inventory. Their work has a direct impact on customer satisfaction.


The organization is in an exciting transformation and digitalization phase in logistics, introducing new technologies and competences to improve performance.


Our client is looking for a Dealer Inventory Management Analyst (DIM Analyst) to temporarily join their team in Göteborg.

**Who They Are**


The DIM Analyst team is a diverse group of innovative colleagues with backgrounds ranging from supply chain expertise to digital development. They foster a strong active care culture, supporting each other through collaboration and transparent communication. With daily stand-ups and an agile approach, they cherish a supportive environment where different skills and passions come together to make magic happen.

**What They Do**

* Combine supply chain knowledge with digital skills to optimize today’s supply chain and build capabilities for a sustainable tomorrow.
* Secure optimized steering of spare parts to 4000+ dealers worldwide through an automated inventory concept, balancing customer availability with a cost-efficient and sustainable supply chain.
* Work closely with IT resources to build a robust dealer data analytical layer that supports data-driven decision-making.
* Drive digitalization of planning processes by building a cloud-native planning solution, enabling agile software development and continuous improvement of supply chain planning capabilities.

**Who You Are**


Our client is looking for a curious analyst who values collaborative development in a global environment and is passionate about delivering excellent customer service and business performance through digital technologies and data insights.


We believe you are:

* A true team player with a curious mindset
* Capable of understanding a global, ever-changing supply chain
* Highly interested in supply chain and inventory optimization
* Skilled in data analytics and able to tell a story based on data
* A self-starter who is comfortable leaving well-trodden paths and engaging cross-functionally
* Proficient in one or more scripting languages (SQL, Python, etc.) – preferable
* Experienced in Agile methodology, software development, or BI development – a plus


This role requires fluency in English.

  

This is a full-time consultant position in Gothenburg through Incluso. Start is January 12th, 6 months limited contract to begin with, with possibility of extension after that. This role is 100% onsite in Gothenburg.  

  

Please submit your CV as soon as possible since we will review the applications on an on-going basis.


For more information about this role, please contact Marianne Nilsson,recruiter at Incluso.

title: Partner Operations Manager
description:
**Introducing evroc**


At evroc, we are building a secure, sovereign, and sustainable hyperscale cloud to reimagine the digital future of Europe. By joining our company, you have an exciting opportunity to contribute to the development of next-generation cloud services. We are seeking intellectually curious and highly motivated team members who are ready to embrace the thrilling challenge of building the first European owned hyperscale cloud.

**Location:** Stockholm

**Job type:** Permanent position

**Join the Pioneers**


As a Partner Operations Manager, you’ll play a central role in scaling evroc’s partner ecosystem and enabling our partnerships to become a true competitive advantage. You’ll act as the operational backbone of the Partnerships team—designing processes, managing partner systems, supporting onboarding and enablement, and ensuring partners and internal teams have the tools, data, and structure they need to succeed.


This is a unique opportunity to build partner operations at an early stage and help shape how we collaborate with some of Europe’s most influential technology partners.

**What You’ll Tackle**

* Own and administer evroc’s partner-relationship-management (PRM) systems and ensure accurate, integrated partner data.
* Coordinate partner onboarding and enablement programs, working closely with partner managers, sales engineers, product teams and integration specialists.
* Develop and maintain standard operating procedures for partner workflows, deal registration, and joint initiatives.
* Act as the central contact point for partner-related questions across sales, marketing, product and finance.
* Define and track key partner performance metrics; build dashboards and surface insights to support decision-making.
* Identify process bottlenecks and drive continuous improvements in collaboration with internal teams and partners.
* Design scalable workflows and automation that enable partner operations to grow alongside evroc’s expansion.

**Skills We Value**

* 3–5 years of experience in partner operations, channel operations or a related field in a technology environment.
* Strong proficiency with CRM/PRM systems (e.g., Salesforce, HubSpot) and ability to design workflows that support partner programs.
* Excellent process and project management skills, with experience creating and documenting SOPs.
* Analytical mindset with the ability to interpret data and generate actionable insights.
* Strong cross-functional collaboration skills and clear communication style.
* Ability to influence stakeholders and drive adoption of new processes.
* Problem-solver who thrives in dynamic environments and embraces continuous learning.

**Why Join evroc?**


We offer a competitive salary and an equity package to attract the best. Whether it’s the cosmopolitan allure of London, the vibrant Stockholm, or the Mediterranean charm of Sophia Antipolis, you’re poised for an inspiring work environment and a captivating local culture!


At evroc, diversity is our strength. We champion an inclusive environment where every background - ethnicity, age, gender identity, beliefs, and culture - is celebrated.

title: Junior Applied AI Automation Engineer
description:
We are seeking a motivated and innovative **Junior Applied AI Automation Engineer** to join our Song Data & AI team. In this role, you will contribute to the development of impactful AI-driven automations and experiences. You will transform business concepts into scalable, production-ready building blocks and prototypes that integrate seamlessly into larger systems. This is an exciting opportunity to work at the intersection of AI and automation, leveraging cutting-edge technologies to deliver meaningful solutions.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* Design and integrate APIs into automation workflows.
* Develop, debug, and test lightweight services using Python or TypeScript.
* Utilize SDKs to interact with language models and manage JSON payloads.
* Work with embeddings, vector databases, and execute small-scale database queries.
* Contribute to evaluation, iteration, instrumentation, and documentation processes.
* Provide support for demos and internal workshops to showcase AI capabilities.

  

**Basic Qualifications:**

* Approximately 1 year of coding experience (Python preferred).
* Foundational understanding of large language models (LLMs) and embeddings, with hands-on experience.
* Proficiency with Git, local development environments, and cloud CLI tools.
* Familiarity with AI-assisted coding tools (e.g., Claude Code, Lvable, Cursor, Codex).

**Preferred Qualifications:**

* Experience with orchestration tools such as n8n or LangChain.
* Knowledge of Slack or Microsoft Teams integration.
* Understanding of Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) concepts and prompt engineering fundamentals.

**Professional Skills / Behaviors:**

* A curious and exploratory mindset with a focus on craft, even in prototype development.
* Strong team collaboration skills and a commitment to shared success.
* Proficiency in English is required. Swedish is optional but an advantage.
* Occasional travel may be required

title: BDR Internship — Do the Work, Learn the Game
description:
Devoteam empowers organizations to accelerate their progress by leveraging the latest advancements in cloud, data, AI, and modern digital services. We go beyond buzzwords to deliver meaningful, hands-on impact through our specialized entities: Google Cloud, ServiceNow Platform, and Creative Tech Sweden.
   

  

 Our Swedish offices in Stockholm, Gothenburg, and Malmö are part of our Nordic setup : ambitious, collaborative, and focused on outcomes. We make decisions quickly, we support each other across teams, and we expect everyone to contribute with real ownership.
   

  

 If you want to be part of a place where learning is fast, responsibility is real, and your work actually matters, you’ll fit in here.
   

  

**Job Description**
 This internship is for someone who wants to build real sales skills — not for someone looking to just “gain experience.” You’ll learn how modern tech companies grow through sales, outreach, market research, and customer engagement. You’ll support the sales and marketing efforts across our Google Cloud, ServiceNow, and Creative Tech teams, gaining exposure to three of the most in-demand areas in the industry.
   

  

**Here’s what you’ll actually do:**
* Research companies, accounts, and contacts — and learn to tell a good lead from a waste of time
* Write personalised outreach messages that don’t sound like everyone else’s
* Support early lead qualification and help structure and maintain our pipeline and tools
* Join team meetings, contribute actively, and track your progress like any other member of the team
* Learn how cloud, AI, digital workflows, and product design solve real business problems
* Build a network across three specialised tech domains within Devoteam


 No coffee runs. No busywork. You’ll be part of the team and expected to grow fast.
   

  

**Qualifications**
 We’re hiring mindset over CV. We want someone who communicates well, learns fast, and takes initiative.
   

  

**You’ll need:**
* Clear, confident communication in English (Swedish is a plus).
* Curiosity about tech, sales, cloud, AI, service management, and digital experiences.
* Ability to follow up — with leads, teammates, and your own tasks.
* A proactive, “give me the ball” attitude.
* Motivation to improve quickly and take ownership.


 You're probably studying business, marketing, or tech — or maybe you're not. That’s less important than how you show up.
   

  

**Additional Information**
* Unpaid internship, based in Stockholm, Gothenburg, or Malmö
* Start date: First week of February
* Duration: Feb to May 2026
* Work closely with senior sales teams across all three Devoteam entities


**What you’ll leave with:**
* Sales skills you won’t learn in a lecture hall
* Actual experience with outreach, pipeline, and customer work
* A reference worth something (if you do the work)
* A shot at staying — or at least, knowing what kind of team you want next


**How to apply:
   

  

 Send us:**
* Your CV
* A short note answering one question: 👉 Why should we take a bet on you?


 Skip the formalities. We care what you bring, not how pretty your template is.

title: Konsultchef / Affärsutvecklare
description:
🚀 Är du redo att ta nästa steg i din karriär och bygga något stort – på riktigt?
   

  

 WeQuel söker en konsultchef/ affärsutvecklare som vill göra affärer i högt tempo, ta fullt ägarskap och arbeta med några av Sveriges mest spännande bolag Life Science, automotive, IT eller andra eventuella industrier. Vi söker båda juniora och seniora konsultchefer
   

  

 Vi är ett växande konsultbolag med kontor i centrala Stockholm, platt organisation och en kultur där
 **initiativ, driv och människan kommer först.** 
 Hos oss får du
 **frihet under ansvar, en provisionsmodell utan tak – och full backning av teamet.**
 🔥
 **Om rollen – för dig som älskar affärer:**
* Du ansvarar för hela kedjan: från att skapa nya kundkontakter, förstå behov, matcha rätt konsult – till att följa upp och bygga långsiktiga relationer.
* Du jobbar tätt med vårt nätverk av vassa konsulter inom life science.
* Du förhandlar, stänger och firar affärer – varje vecka.
* Du bygger din egen portfölj, samtidigt som du stöttas av ett erfaret team.


 💡
 **Vem vi tror att du är:**
* Du brinner för att göra affärer och ta hand om dina konsulter och kunder
* Du är affärsdriven, självständig och har lätt för att bygga förtroende.
* Du vill jobba i ett högt tempo och få saker att hända, inte vänta på beslut.
* Har du jobbat med försäljning, konsultförmedling eller rekrytering? Det är ett plus – men inte ett krav.
* Du är redo att forma din egen framgång och få betalt därefter.


 💰
 **Vad du får hos oss:**
* 💸 En provisionsmodell utan tak du styr själv hur mycket du tjänar.
* 🔑 Frihet att bygga din roll och kundportfölj i en framtidsbransch.
* 🧠 Tillgång till ett väletablerat konsultnätverk, du får verktygen att lyckas från dag ett.
* 🤝 En inkluderande, snabbfotad kultur där du är med och formar framtiden.
* 📈 Möjlighet att växa till senior roll eller team lead, för den som vill längre.


 🎯
 **Redo att göra skillnad – och tjäna därefter?**
 Vi letar efter dig som vill växa tillsammans med oss, varje dag.
   

  

**Tvekar du? Hör av dig ändå – vi bokar gärna ett förutsättningslöst samtal.**

title: AI Consultant
description:
Anmälan
   

  

* On Campus
+ 360 AI Stellar Executive Program
+ Future Foresight Program
+ Generative AI Bootcamp
+ Cybersecurity Masterclass
+ AI Personal Coaching

* Customized Programs
* Research
* About
+ About us
+ Faculty
+ Careers
+ Press

* Blog
* Contact
* More...


 Use tab to navigate through the menu items.
   

  

 AI Consultant
   

  

 Are you passionate about making AI understandable and meaningful for people? Do you love creating moments of insight, guiding learning experiences, and helping others grow their confidence in new technologies? At Stellar Capacity, we’re looking for a dynamic AI Consultant to help us lead AI-focused programs, workshops, and learning journeys for some of Sweden’s most forward-thinking organizations.
   

  

 In this role, you’ll collaborate with our expert team to deliver powerful, hands-on learning experiences that connect AI with real-world challenges and opportunities. From executive leaders to frontline professionals, you’ll support people across sectors in building the mindset and skills they need to navigate an AI-driven future.
   

  

 This is more than a facilitation role, it’s a chance to help shape how organizations across Sweden understand, explore, and work with AI. If you're excited by the idea of empowering others through education, we’d love to hear from you.
   

  

 Your role
   

  

* Lead comprehensive AI and Generative AI programs, workshops, and learning journeys for professionals across all organizational levels
* Deliver engaging presentations on AI fundamentals, prompt engineering, and practical applications
* Facilitate hands-on workshops and learning sessions with cutting-edge tools like ChatGPT, Claude, and Copilot
* Guide strategic discussions on implementation and organizational change
* Create meaningful learning experiences that drive real business outcomes


 Your profile
   

  

* Strong knowledge of the generative AI landscape, especially large language models (LLMs) and fast-evolving tools
* Extensive hands-on experience with tools such as ChatGPT, Claude, Copilot, and multimodal AI platforms
* Excellent facilitation and public speaking skills, with experience engaging both senior leaders and diverse participant groups
* Proven track record of designing and delivering impactful training or workshop experiences—particularly for executive audiences
* Ability to cut through the AI hype and help others focus on real, applicable business value
* Native Swedish speaker with fluent English in both written and spoken form


**We're Looking For You Who**
* Knows how to command a room, keeping energy high and engagement strong throughout intensive learning experiences
* Makes complex technical concepts accessible and actionable for business leaders
* Has a natural ability to read the room and adapt to different people and learning styles
* Stay curious and up to date with the latest in AI developments and translates innovations into practical value
* Champions digital transformation and can help others grow as future-ready leaders
* Balances technical depth with inspirational delivery


**We Offer**
* Opportunity to work with some of Sweden's top leaders and organizations
* Join a world-class faculty and stimulating network of AI experts and leadership profiles
* Continuous professional development at the forefront of AI advancement
* Flexible working arrangements aligned with program schedules


 Interested? Here's how to apply:
   

  

 If you're ready to be the face of AI transformation for Sweden's leading organizations, we want to hear from you.
   

  

 Please send your application, including your CV highlighting your facilitation and AI experience, to henrik@stellarcapacity.com. Use subject line: AI Consultant Application
   

  

**About Stellar Capacity**
 Stellar Capacity is Sweden's leading educational company developing digital skills and future-oriented leadership for individuals and organizations. Our programs provide unparalleled learning experiences featuring world-class faculty, transformative leadership focus, and practical knowledge application - making us the top choice for businesses looking to leverage rapid technological developments.
   

  

 360 AI Stellar Executive Program
   

  

 Stellar Future Foresight Program
   

  

 Generative AI Bootcamps
   

  

 Customized Programs
   

  

 AI Personal Coaching
   

  

 Careers
   

  

 Contact us
   

  

 Privacy Policy
   

  

 Stellar Capacity
   

  

 Torsgatan 26, 113 21 Stockholm
   

  

 info@stellarcapacity.com
   

  

 For press inquiries: +46 700 324071
   

  

 © 2025 Stellar Capacity

title: Solutions Engineer
description:
**This is Adyen**
 Adyen provides payments, data, and financial products in a single solution for customers like Meta, Uber, H&M, and Microsoft - making us the financial technology platform of choice. At Adyen, everything we do is engineered for ambition.
   

  

 For our teams, we create an environment with opportunities for our people to succeed, backed by the culture and support to ensure they are enabled to truly own their careers. We are motivated individuals who tackle unique technical challenges at scale and solve them as a team. Together, we deliver innovative and ethical solutions that help businesses achieve their ambitions faster.
   

  

**Solutions Engineer**
 Adyen is looking for a Solutions Engineer to manage new implementations and/or enhancements for our quickly growing portfolio of merchants. You will work with Adyen's largest merchants globally to solution, consult, troubleshoot, implement, and launch scalable technical integrations. The ideal candidate is both consultative and technical. This position is based in our centrally located Stockholm office.
   

  

 Adyen is looking for Implementation Managers with a solid understanding of and hands-on experience with technology, integration design, project management and a strong merchant focus. As an Implementation Manager, you will be the primary point of contact for our merchant's technical teams, guiding them through the design, development, testing, and launch phases of their integrations with Adyen's platform. Your focus will be on ensuring an exceptional merchant experience throughout the project lifecycle.
   

  

 In this role, you will have the opportunity to work on diverse projects that encompass various payment solutions, including Point of Sale (POS) systems, e-commerce platforms, marketplaces, and card issuing programs. By leveraging your technical proficiency and business acumen, you will play a vital role in guaranteeing a smooth implementation process and maintaining open lines of communication with our merchants and internal teams.
   

  

**What You'll Do**
* Utilize your technical expertise to create scalable and robust solutions for merchant integrations, while ensuring adherence to payment best practices.
* Serve as a consultative partner in specific verticals such as e-commerce, point of sale, and multi-faceted platforms, guiding merchants through integration processes.
* Collaborate cross-functionally with Sales, Account Managers, Product, and Engineering teams to deliver seamless merchant experiences and drive continuous improvements.
* Leverage project management and technical consulting skills to oversee high-quality project delivery, guaranteeing the technical integrity of merchant integrations.
* Provide consultation on optimizing payment solutions, including checkout experiences, authentication, omni-channel payments, and platform onboarding, while collaborating with Developers and Product Managers to enhance the platform.


**Who You Are**
* 4+ years experience integrating and/or providing technical consultation when integrating with Web APIs.
* Proven ability to quickly learn new technologies, understand complex systems (APIs, databases, SDK's, etc.), and desire to improve technical acumen.
* Excellent communication skills; comfortable leading meetings with high level decision makers.
* Ability to identify and clearly communicate pragmatic solutions to complex integration problems.
* Fluency in Swedish/Nordic languages and English is required for this position.
* Experience in the payments landscape is a big plus


**Our Diversity, Equity and Inclusion commitments**
 Our unique approach is a product of our diverse perspectives. This diversity of backgrounds and cultures is essential in helping us maintain our momentum. Our business and technical challenges are unique, and we need as many different voices as possible to join us in solving them - voices like yours. No matter who you are or where you’re from, we welcome you to be your true self at Adyen.
   

  

 Studies show that women and members of underrepresented communities apply for jobs only if they meet 100% of the qualifications. Does this sound like you? If so, Adyen encourages you to reconsider and apply. We look forward to your application!
   

  

**What’s next?**
 Ensuring a smooth and enjoyable candidate experience is critical for us. We aim to get back to you regarding your application within 5 business days. Our interview process tends to take about 4 weeks to complete, but may fluctuate depending on the role. Learn more about our hiring process here. Don’t be afraid to let us know if you need more flexibility.
   

  

 This role is based out of our Stockholm office. We are an office-first company and value in-person collaboration; we do not offer remote-only roles.

title: Customer Education Lead
description:
**Why Lovable?**
 Lovable lets anyone and everyone build software with any language. From solopreneurs to Fortune 100 teams, millions of people use Lovable to transform raw ideas into real products - fast. We are at the forefront of a foundational shift in software creation, which means you have an unprecedented opportunity to change the way the digital world works. Over 2 million people in 200+ countries already use Lovable to launch businesses, automate work, and bring their ideas to life. And we’re just getting started.
   

  

 We’re a small, talent-dense team building a generation-defining company from Stockholm. We value extreme ownership, high velocity and low-ego collaboration. We seek out people who care deeply, ship fast, and are eager to make a dent in the world.
   

  

**The Role**
 We’re hiring a Customer Education Lead to build and operationalize Lovable’s learning programs — from onboarding to advanced enablement. This role combines content strategy, instructional design, and program execution. You’ll create scalable education frameworks that help every customer — from early adopters to global enterprises — succeed on Lovable.
   

  

**What You’ll Own**
* Program Design: Develop and execute structured learning programs that guide customers from first login to advanced use cases.
* Content Design and Development: Create and manage a portfolio of tutorials, videos, guides, and certification paths that evolve with the product.
* Training Delivery: Lead live and virtual sessions for new customers and enterprise rollouts; enable internal teams to deliver these independently.
* Cross-Functional Enablement: Partner with CS, Product, and Marketing to align education initiatives with product releases, adoption goals, and customer milestones.
* Measurement & Optimization: Define metrics for activation, usage, and retention; analyze program impact and iterate quickly.
* Knowledge Infrastructure: Establish and maintain Lovable’s customer knowledge base, learning hub, and course catalog.


**You’ll Excel Here If You...**
* Have 5+ years of experience in customer education, enablement, or instructional design at a SaaS or product-led company.
* Know how to translate technical concepts into clear, actionable learning experiences.
* Are highly organized and skilled at building systems that scale — not one-off sessions.
* Are data-driven and can measure learning impact against business outcomes.
* Thrive in a fast-moving environment and can balance strategy with hands-on creation.


**Success Looks Like**
* Every new customer reaches meaningful activation within days, not weeks.
* Lovable’s learning programs drive measurable gains in usage, expansion, and retention.
* Education content becomes a key asset for CS, Sales, and Marketing teams.
* The customer education engine runs predictably, with clear ownership and metrics.


**Why This Role Matters**
 Customer education is one of Lovable’s most powerful levers for adoption and expansion. You’ll build the foundation that enables thousands of teams to learn faster, unlock the value of AI-native tools, and scale their creativity with confidence.

title: Head of Construction – Data Centre Projects
description:
**Introducing evroc**
 At evroc, we are building a secure, sovereign, and sustainable hyperscale cloud to reimagine the digital future of Europe. By joining our company, you have an exciting opportunity to contribute to the development of next-generation cloud services. We are seeking intellectually curious and highly motivated team members who are ready to embrace the thrilling challenge of building the first European-owned hyperscale cloud.
   

  

**Location:** 
 Stockholm
   

  

**Job type:** 
 Permanent position
   

  

**Join the Pioneers**
 We’re looking for an experienced Head of Construction to lead the delivery of evroc’s hyperscale data centre projects across Europe.
   

  

 In this role, you will build and guide our construction and installation organisation, shape our execution model, and ensure our state-of-the-art facilities are delivered safely, on time, on budget, and to world-class quality standards.
   

  

 This is a unique opportunity to join at a foundational stage and define how Europe’s sovereign cloud infrastructure is physically built.
   

  

**What You’ll Tackle**
* Lead and develop evroc’s construction & installation team across multiple international sites.
* Define construction processes, standards, and delivery frameworks for large-scale data centre builds.
* Work closely with project management, design, procurement, commissioning and project controls to ensure alignment on scope, schedule and risk.
* Manage contractors and vendors throughout tendering, selection and execution.
* Oversee on-site progress, resolve escalations, and drive performance across safety, quality, cost and schedule.
* Provide constructability input into early design and support seamless transition into commissioning and operations.
* Build a strong safety-first and quality-driven culture across all project partners.


**Skills We Value**
* 10+ years of construction experience, including work on large, complex infrastructure projects.
* Strong background in construction or installation management, preferably in mission-critical environments.
* Leadership experience building and managing international teams.
* Demonstrated experience delivering data centre projects.
* Ability to drive contractors, mitigate risks early, and maintain clarity in fast-paced environments.


**Why Join evroc?**
 We offer a competitive salary and an equity package to attract the best. Whether it’s the cosmopolitan allure of London, the vibrant Stockholm, or the Mediterranean charm of Sophia Antipolis, you’re poised for an inspiring work environment and a captivating local culture!
   

  

 At evroc, diversity is our strength. We champion an inclusive environment where every background - ethnicity, age, gender identity, beliefs, and culture - is celebrated.
   

  

 Applicants must possess a valid work permit.

title: System Engineer
description:
Vill du göra skillnad genom att vara med och bygga framtidens tekniska plattformar för ett av Sveriges största försäkringsbolag? Vi söker nu en System Engineer till vårt Infrastrukturteam – ett team med ett avgörande uppdrag: att tillhandahålla och vidareutveckla infrastrukturen för våra sakförsäkringssystem.
 



  





 Hos oss får du arbeta med modern teknik, påverka tekniska vägval och vara en nyckelspelare i vår digitala transformation.
 



  





**Det här gör du som System Engineer på Folksam** 




 Som System Engineer hos oss kommer du att:
 


* Utveckla och förvalta vår infrastruktur, CI/CD-pipelines, monitorering och automatisering.
* Arbeta hands-on med deployer, testmiljöhantering och incidenthantering.
* Samarbeta med utvecklingsteam, arkitekter och andra teknikspecialister för att lösa komplexa tekniska utmaningar.
* Säkerställa att våra plattformar lever upp till krav på tillgänglighet, säkerhet, kostnadseffektivitet och kontinuitet.
* Bidra till arkitekturella underlag och tekniska beslut som påverkar hela bolaget.



  





 Vi arbetar bland annat med:
 


* Azure
* Red Hat OpenShift
* GitLab
* Terraform, Helm, ArgoCD
* HashiCorp Vault, JFrog Artifactory och Xray
* Elastic (ELK-Stack) för monitorering och logghantering
* MS SQL, SQL management studio, Powershell



 Du får stor frihet att påverka både din egen tekniska utveckling och Folksams tekniska riktning.
 



  





**Är du den vi söker?** 




 Nu söker vi dig som:
 


* Har flerårig erfarenhet av teknik- och plattformsarbete.
* Ser helheten i tekniska leveranser och fångar upp frågor som annars riskerar att falla mellan stolarna.
* Har relevant högskoleutbildning eller motsvarande erfarenhet.
* Ser ständigt lärande som en självklarhet.
* Är kommunikativ, lösningsorienterad och gillar att samarbeta med andra.



  





 Vi ser gärna att du har erfarenhet av:
 


* Moderna plattformar som Kubernetes och Openshift.
* Versionshanterad infrastrukturkod och automatisering.
* Att designa och utveckla robusta och säkra lösningar enligt regulatoriska krav.
* Felsökning inom CI/CD, DevSecOps och monitoreringsplattformar.
* Skriptning
* Agila arbetssätt och verktyg, gärna SAFe.



  





**Här kan du göra skillnad** 




 Välkommen till Folksam – här driver du viktiga frågor framåt. Från de avgörande detaljerna till de stora perspektiven, med fokus på att förenkla våra kunders vardag. Det gör att du bidrar till något större, oavsett roll. Här finns det många roliga, utvecklande jobb och du har goda chanser till en spännande karriär.
 



  





 Vi tror på ett hållbart arbetsliv och jobbar aktivt med inkludering och mångfald. Våra moderna kontor bjuder in till samarbete och lärande, här får vi saker att hända! Du har flexibiliteten att kunna varva arbete på kontoret med att jobba hemifrån, utifrån verksamhetens behov.
 



 Läs mer och se filmer om livet hos oss på folksam.se/jobb-och-karriar.
 



  





**Så söker du jobbet** 




 Välkommen att skicka in din ansökan redan idag, men senast 7 januari 2026.
 



  





 Vill du veta mer om jobbet är du välkommen att kontakta gruppchef Mattias Sahlström, 070-831 63 26.
 



  





 Fackliga representanter: Akademikerföreningen Per Hansson 070-831 60 67, Forena Ylva Landerfors Nordqvist 072-468 72 30 och Handels Mikael Carlsson 070-831 51 32.
 



  





*Kundägda Folksamgruppen erbjuder sedan 1908 försäkringar och sparande som ger trygghet i livets alla skeden. Vi gör det enklare för våra fyra miljoner kunder att känna sig trygga i en hållbar värld genom rätt försäkringar, rätt sparande och rätt hjälp när något händer.*

title: Technical Project Manager - Global Web
description:
Are you passionate about web technology, eager to take ownership, and ready to lead projects from start to finish? If so, join our high-performing Digital Communications & CX team in Stockholm, Sweden, where we deliver modern websites for ASSA ABLOY brands across the globe.
   

  

 You would thrive in an agile, collaborative environment that encourages new ideas and experimentation. Working with a diverse, cross-functional team from around the world, you would help deliver best-in-class customer experience. You would also have the freedom to innovate and enhance third-party applications that keep our websites running smoothly.
   

  

 No two days are the same—each day brings new challenges and exciting opportunities!
   

  

**What you would do as our Technical** 
**Project Manager**
 You would be a proactive and independent professional who can oversee the applications and integrations essential for operating our external websites. You would ensure stability, security, and high performance by coordinating across teams and driving initiatives from concept to implementation.
   

  

 While expertise in project planning, stakeholder management, vendor coordination, and web development is valuable, the key requirement is your ability to take initiative, deliver results, and bring enthusiasm for agile ways of working.
   

  

 You would also:
   

  

* Take ownership of third-party applications used on our external websites throughout their lifecycle (e.g., internal search engine, dealer locator, cookie management, cloud hosting, CDN).
* Oversee integrations between external platforms and our websites, ensuring reliability, scalability, and security (e.g., PIMs, press release platform, job openings platform, authentication platform).
* Act as the primary point of contact for third-party vendors and integration partners, including coordinating internal resources responsible for implementing technical improvements.
* Monitor costs and usage of third-party applications, tracking website health and technical performance, and proactively identifying and resolving issues.
* Ensure compliance with security and data protection best practices across managed applications.


**The Skills And Experience You Need**
 We are looking for someone who has:
   

  

* A bachelor’s degree in computer science, Information Systems, Engineering, or a related field.
* Solid understanding of web technologies including CMS, APIs, hosting, monitoring tools, and third-party integrations.
* Experience in website management, troubleshooting, and performance optimization.
* Strong project management skills with the ability to prioritize, plan, and execute initiatives, and communicate effectively with both technical and non-technical stakeholders in English.
* Familiarity with agile methodologies such as Scrum and Kanban, and experience working in agile, cross-functional teams.
* Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English; Swedish is a plus.


 Since every day at ASSA ABLOY brings new challenges, it’s important to have an open mindset and understand that responsibilities may evolve over time.
   

  

 To be considered for this role, you must be legally eligible to work in Sweden and able to work from the office a few days per week.
   

  

**What We Offer**
 We’re passionate about providing amazing opportunities and benefits, so you can continue and progress a lifelong career with us – here’s what we have to offer:
   

  

* Learning and career development opportunities, whether it’s online learning, management training or enhancing your skills.
* A competitive salary and incentive schemes.
* Employment at one of Sweden’s most innovative companies according to Forbes.
* The opportunity to grow your skills in a versatile way.
* Hybrid work with an office in a central location in Stockholm.
* Flexible working hours for an optimal work-life balance.
* Wellness benefits and lunch card.


**We review applications regularly, so don't wait**
 We are building diverse, inclusive teams, and encourage applications from everyone who can see themselves working with us. Just set up your profile and apply here.
   

  

 To make sure your personal data is safe, we don’t look at any applications sent by email or post. If you have any questions about the role or the process, email Khalil Kabakibi, Talent Acquisition Business Partner, at khalil.kabakibi@assaabloy.com
   

  

 Depending on the risk profile for the role, a background screening will need to be performed. Final candidates may therefore be a subject to a background screening. The performance of a background check is subject to consent and based on our Applicant Privacy Notice.
   

  

 Let’s create a safer and more open world - together!
   

  

 To find out more about us, visit www.assaabloy.com
   

  

**We are the ASSA ABLOY Group**
 Our people have made us the global leader in access solutions. In return, we open doors for them wherever they go. With nearly 63,000 colleagues in more than 70 different countries, we help billions of people experience a more open world. Our innovations make all sorts of spaces – physical and virtual – safer, more secure, and easier to access.
   

  

 As an employer, we value results – not titles, or backgrounds. We empower our people to build their career around their aspirations and our ambitions – supporting them with regular feedback, training, and development opportunities. Our colleagues think broadly about where they can make the most impact, and we encourage them to grow their role locally, regionally, or even internationally.
   

  

 As we welcome new people on board, it’s important to us to have diverse, inclusive teams, and we value different perspectives and experiences.

title: Management Consultant / Manager - CFO&EV SE
description:
**Are you a true team player who wants to be part of an organization that strives to make a difference by innovating with a purpose? Are you highly motivated to own the data-oriented future of finance together with our clients?**
 Accenture’s CFO & Enterprise Value team would like to hear from you!
   

  

 As part of Accenture CFO & Enterprise Value you will help organizations to unlock their potential and make Reinvention part of your career.
   

  

 We are looking for a
 **Strategy and Consulting Consultant or Manager** 
 for our
 **CFO & Enterprise Value** 
 team in Stockholm.
   

  

 To succeed in the role you are a driven, ambitious, and proactive leader who enjoys drawing and explaining the bigger picture, while still having a practical approach and expertise. You will drive business development efforts and identify new opportunities as well as ensure successful project delivery and client satisfaction.
   

  

**What You Will Do**
- Integrated finance operating model and shared service center design and establishment

- Finance platform transformation and organization restructuring

- Strategic finance operations with finance process development and optimization

- Automation projects of finance processes including AI/GenAI/Agentic AI

- Enterprise performance management including budgeting, planning, and forecasting development

- Performance management design and development

- Strategic cost reduction and operational efficiency

- Pricing strategies

**What´s In It For You**
- Truly competitive salary terms, bonus schemes, pension, health insurance, employee stock purchase program etc.

- Work-life balance is important to us. Volunteer roles and events through our internal networks

- Access to several social activities through active corporate sports community

- Monthly community meetings with a focus on personal and professional development

- A variety of formal and informal training programs at every level to help you acquire and build specialized skills faster

**To success in this role, we believe you have:**
- A Master’s degree in a relevant field, e.g. Accounting, Finance or Industrial Engineering with excellent academic performance

- 5 + years of strategy and/or management consulting experience related to the CFO Agenda (e.g., finance transformation, enterprise performance management, finance operating model, platform transformation) that impacts the finance functions in various organizations.

- Experience from diverse projects and teams

- Fluent in English (incl. experience with written and oral presentations in English) and Swedish, conducting interviews and workshops facilitation

**The position will report to CFO & EV Lead and workplace is Stockholm, Sweden. Some travel should be expected.**
**Interested?**
 Apply online by attaching your CV, application letter and educational diplomas as soon as possible.
 **We look forward to receiving your application.**
**Please expect some delay in the process due to Christmas holiday!**
**About CFO & EV In Accenture**
 We provide end-to-end services to address the unique challenges faced by Finance Executives to help develop and lead a more efficient and effective Finance function, enabling more data-driven insights, enterprise innovation and creating new value in a digital world.
   

  

 We are looking to enhance our team to engage them in areas of:
   

  

**Enterprise performance management** 
 – Develop integrated, cloud-enabled, planning and enterprise performance analysis capabilities that will enhance strategic insights and accelerate business decisions.
   

  

**Finance operations** 
 – Ensure business continuity and de-risk the organization in a downturn economy through an agile operating model in which high-performance Finance & Accounting can be delivered anytime, anywhere.
   

  

**Finance Platform Transformation** 
 – Help finance organizations secure the opportunity to take their system implementation to the next level by developing harmonized and standard processes and streamlining their data models.
   

  

**Enterprise Value** 
 – Identify and realize value for the enterprise and help drive measurable outcomes through digital investments at the right pace and scale.
   

  

**Enterprise Analytics** 
 – Help CFOs to become more data-driven to provide insights enabling true business partnering in Finance required for sustainable growth and decision-making
   

  

**Automation and AI** 
 – Help organizations become leading edge companies utilizing generative AI, process- and task mining

title: Juniora Analysts till Operations Transformation, Engineering, AI & Data (Stockholm) – Aug 2026
description:
Deloitte är en globalt ledande leverantör av Audit & Assurance, Tax & Legal och Consultative Services. Med mer än 450 000 medarbetare i över 150 länder hjälper vi våra klienter och vår omvärld att lösa komplexa problem och nå ambitiösa mål genom områdes- och branschexpertis, global räckvidd och allianser med de största tech-leverantörerna. Det som definierar Deloitte är vår strävan efter att göra en meningsfull skillnad. För oss innebär det långsiktig utveckling och resultat för våra klienter och deras företag, idéer och handlingar som också bidrar till en positiv samhällsutveckling. Det handlar även om att stärka våra medarbetare och främja deras utveckling.
   

  

  




**Jobbeskrivning**

 Operations Transformation, Engineering, AI & Data stödjer våra kunder att driva strategiska förändringsprojekt där vi implementerar affärsstrategier och utvecklar deras operationella förmågor för att hjälpa dem nå sina affärsmål. Vi arbetar med verksamhetsförändring där vi använder våra industrispecifika lösningar och tekniska kunskaper för att transformera, modernisera och optimera våra klienters processer och tekniska plattformar.
   

  

  





**AI & Data:**




 Inom AI & Data-teamet hjälper du Deloittes kunder att förbättra beslutsfattande genom datadrivna insikter och skapa insiktsdrivna organisationer. Du kommer att arbeta med implementering av AI, GenAI, cloud data platforms, data warehouse och BI/analytics, med fokus på data science, maskininlärning, statistisk analys och modellering för att leverera avancerade insikter och affärsvärde. Vår modell är on-the-job-training där du växer in i mer ansvarsfulla roller och vidareutbildar dig i tekniska plattformar som Google Cloud Platform, AWS, Azure, Snowflake och Databricks. I det rådgivande spåret arbetar du med data management, data governance och datastrategi. Vi ser gärna att du har en traditionell managementkonsultutbildning kombinerad med data och teknik samt ett intresse för rådgivning. AI & Data-teamet verkar i en nordisk organisation med mycket kunskapskapital och kompetens, så du kommer att medverka i projekt, communities och utbildningar tillsammans med nordiska kollegor.
   

  

  




**Kvalifikationer**

 Vi söker dig som:
   

  

  




* Är nyexaminerad ingenjör, systemvetare med en masterexamen inom management, data/data eller science/analytics.
* Har relevant arbetslivserfarenhet – erfarenhet inom konsultbranschen är meriterande
* Har goda språkkunskaper i svenska och engelska, både i tal och skrift


 Meriterande:
   

  

  

* Goda akademiska meriter, internationell erfarenhet och relevant engagemang vid sidan av studierna
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta både självständigt och tillsammans i ett team, med målmedvetenhet, engagemang och driv
* Intresse för hur digitalisering och ny teknik kan utveckla verksamheter och branscher


 Du är en prestigelös lagspelare som trivs med att arbeta projektbaserat, i nära samarbete med både ditt team och klienter, i en dynamisk miljö.
   

  

  


*Om du är osäker på om du uppfyller ovan kvalifikationer uppmuntrar vi dig att skicka in en ansökan ändå.*



**Ytterligare information**

**Vi erbjuder**
  

 Som en del av Deloitte får du tillgång till världens största konsultnätverk tillsammans med kunniga och engagerade kollegor som är experter inom sina områden. Du får arbeta med spännande, komplexa uppdrag, både på global och nordisk nivå, i team som alltid värderar ditt perspektiv. Vi lägger stor vikt vid att erbjuda dig möjligheter att driva din personliga utveckling. Vi erbjuder dig praktisk erfarenhet, en personlig coach som långsiktigt stöttar dig i din karriär och kontinuerlig feedback och support från mer erfarna kollegor.
   

  

  





 Du får möjlighet att arbeta i ett företag som hjälper andra aktörer i deras resa mot en mer hållbar organisation, samtidigt som vi arbetar målmedvetet med våra egna ambitioner inom både klimat, miljö och socialt ansvar. Vi ser ett värde i att våra medarbetare har olika erfarenheter vilket främjar nytänkande och bidrar till fler perspektiv.
   

  

  





**Ansökan**
  

 Du ansöker online. Din ansökan ska bestå av:
   

  

  




* CV


* Betygskopior från högskola/universitet - De betyg som du laddar upp bör inte vara utdragna senare än 2 månader tillbaka i tiden.


 I det första steget laddar du upp ditt CV. I nästa steg laddar du upp dina universitetsbetyg (över hittills avklarade kurser) samt svarar på frågor som är kopplade till rollen, inklusive en motivering till varför du sökt denna roll. Observera att både CV samt fullständiga betyg behöver laddas upp för att din ansökan ska ses som fullständig. Vi tillämpar löpande urval, så skicka gärna in din ansökan så snart som möjligt. Vid inskickad ansökan ska du få ett bekräftelsemejl från oss. Får du inte detta mejl råder vi dig att skicka in din ansökan på nytt. Om du söker flera tjänster hos oss ber vi dig att i dina ansökningar tydliggöra vilken roll du är mest intresserad av.
   

  

  


 Som ett kvalitativt led i Deloittes rekryteringsprocess genomgår våra slutkandidater en bakgrundskontroll, detta för att öka kännedomen om våra framtida medarbetare, trygga arbetsmiljön för våra medarbetare och möta regelkrav. Processen för bakgrundskontroller genomförs i samarbete med ToFindOut. https://tofindout.se/sv/faq/. För de tjänster som Deloitte efterfrågar universitetsbetyg genomförs en verifiering som en del i rekryteringsprocessen. För frågor hänvisar vi till ansvarig rekryterare i processen.
   

  

  





**Frågor**
  

 Om du har frågor om tjänsten eller om rekryteringsprocessen är du välkommen att kontakta ansvarig rekryterare Johanna Aspegårdh, jaspegardh@deloitte.se
   

  

  





 Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!
   

  

  





**What impact will you make?**




 På Deloitte gör ditt arbete en meningsfull skillnad, varje dag, medan du växer i en inkluderande företagskultur av samarbete och hög prestation. Utöver att skapa lösningar strävar vi efter att göra en positiv och avgörande skillnad för andra i vår omgivning, våra klienter och samhället. På Deloitte hittar du tidigare dolda möjligheter att lyckas och inser din fulla potential.

title: Supporttekniker till vår kund i Solna
company: Wise IT, part of Wise People Group
description:
**OM ROLLEN**
 I rollen blir du en central del av kundens IT-support. Du kommer:
   

  

* Tar emot och hanterar ärenden via chatt och telefon samt i ärendehanteringssystem
* Arbetar i MS‑miljö (Windows, Microsoft 365/Entra, Azure och övriga molntjänster)
* Felsöker, åtgärdar och eskalerar ärenden från 1st line till 2nd line vid behov
* Dokumenterar lösningar och bygger upp kunskapsartiklar enligt KCS‑principer
* Har leverantörskontakter vid behov för incidenter, beställningar och uppföljning
* Genomför IT‑introduktion för nya medarbetare (konton, behörigheter och utrustning)


**DIN PROFIL**
* Har erfarenhet av IT‑support i first/second line och trivs i en service desk‑miljö
* Är bekväm i Microsoft 365 och Azure‑/molnverktyg, samt grundläggande nätverk/klientfelsökning
* Jobbar strukturerat i ärendehantering, med hög kvalitet på dokumentation
* Kommunicerar tydligt och professionellt på svenska och engelska, både i text och tal
* Är nyfiken, lösningsorienterad och trivs med många kontaktytor


**MERITERANDE**
* KCS‑certifiering eller motsvarande erfarenhet av Knowledge‑Centered Service
* Erfarenhet av att hålla introduktioner/onboardingar för nya användare
* Vana av samarbete med externa leverantörer och beställningsflöden


**PRAKTISK INFO**
* Placering: Solna, på plats fem dagar i veckan
* Omfattning: Heltid
* Start: Enligt överenskommelse
* Uppdragsform: Konsultuppdrag


**OM WISE IT**
 Wise IT är specialister på rekrytering, konsultlösningar och strategisk kompetensmatchning inom IT och tech. Teknik förändras snabbt , men med rätt person på rätt plats får du kontroll på framtiden. Vi matchar människor med skarp teknisk kompetens och förmågan att förstå helheten. Resultatet? IT som fungerar i praktiken, inte bara i teorin. Vi ser till att du inte bara följer utvecklingen utan driver den.
   

  

**NÄR DU BLIR EN AV OSS**
 Som konsult hos Wise blir du en del av ett sammanhang där vi värdesätter både din trygghet och din utveckling. Vi erbjuder marknadsmässig lön, friskvårdsbidrag, pensionsavsättning och kollektivavtal – för oss är inget viktigare än att du känner dig trygg i din anställning.
   

  

 Från dag ett på ditt konsultuppdrag får du möjlighet att utvecklas, utmanas och påverka framtidens arbetsplatser – tillsammans med engagerade kollegor, och med oss som ständigt bollplank. Oavsett var du befinner dig i karriären ska rollen som konsult ge dig erfarenheter, kunskaper och inspiration inför nästa steg.
   

  

 Välkommen till Wise – en värld full av möjligheter!
   

  

**DIN ANSÖKAN**
 För att söka rollen klicka på ”Ansök nu”, samt bifoga CV. Notera att vi ej kan ta emot ansökningar via mail. I konsultvärden går det ofta snabbt så tjänsten kan komma att tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdatum. Vänta därför inte med din ansökan.

title: Senior M365 Security Engineer
description:
**Do you want to be at the forefront of protecting our society against cyber threats? We are looking for a Senior M365 Security Engineer to team up with the most dedicated team of cyber specialists in our Secure Infrastructure domain.**
**About Truesec – A Leading Cybersecurity Company**
 Since 2005, Truesec has been a native cybersecurity company, driven by one single purpose: Creating safety and sustainability in a digital world by preventing cyber breach and minimizing impact.
   

  

 Over the years, we’ve earned the trust of organizations worldwide and gained a strong reputation internationally. Our team consists of dedicated specialists covering the entire spectrum of cybersecurity – with capabilities in Predict, Prevent, Protect, Respond, and Recover.
   

  

 Today, we employ around 350 employees – and as cybercrime grows, we need to grow. To support that goal, we are now looking for a Senior M365 Security Engineer who wants to make a difference in our Secure Infrastructure domain.
   

  

**Secure Infrastructure**
 Looking at the actual threat landscape today, it’s more important than ever to design and build infrastructure solutions that incorporate correct and relevant security features. The team works closely together using their combined knowledge and experience gathered from different projects and Incident Response cases to help our customers stay ahead of the threat actors. We continuously help customers improve their security posture within cloud, data center, endpoint management, identity, M365, and networking.
   

  

**The Role**
 Truesec is seeking a Senior Microsoft 365 engineer for a full-time role in Stockholm or remote. The cloud engineer interfaces regularly with team members and customers, determines technical requirements, feasibility of projects and expectations. You are responsible for maintaining, implementing, and designing client-facing solutions primarily in M365 Security and Entra ID. This role is for someone who wants to be hands-on in a technical role leaning heavily towards Cloud and Cloud Security. You must be able to think on your feet and you’ve got to want to learn and be part of a highly skilled and innovative team. Other responsibilities you might have can be:
   

  

* Run health and security checks within M365 and Entra ID
* Provide customers recommendations and prioritization of how to improve their security posture over time.
* Implement solutions based on Statement of Work with customers


**Your Potential Background**
 We believe that your background probably entails 5+ years of experience and expertise within the Microsoft public cloud, such as M365 Security, Intune and Entra ID, including troubleshooting, deploying, and configuring of said solutions. It's likely that you also have experience with hybrid environments, Conditional Access, and Azure Security.
   

  

**Required Skills:**
* Strong Experience of M365 Security platform
* Strong Experience of Entra ID
* Genuine interest of helping customers within Cybersecurity
* Ability to prioritize and create implementation plans for Customers


**Bonus Skills:**
* Experience within Client Management
* Understanding of M365 licensing
* Ability to script and automate
* Experience with hybrid environments


*Due to the sensitivity in our assignments, we require Swedish citizenship, citizenship in an EU country, or a Swedish work permit.*
**Join Our Mission Toward a Safe Digital Future**
 If you truly want to make a difference and make our world a little bit safer, this is the place for you. At Truesec, you'll get to be at the forefront of fighting cybercrime instead of reading about it in the news. This is your chance to be part of an exciting journey in a leading cybersecurity company - and learn from some of the best in their field.
   

  

 So, are you ready to team up with the most dedicated team of experts and be part of a meaningful mission? Then we are excited to get to know you!

title: Sr. Account Executive
description:
**Opentext - The Information Company**
 OpenText is a global leader in information management, where innovation, creativity, and collaboration are the key components of our corporate culture. As a member of our team, you will have the opportunity to partner with the most highly regarded companies in the world, tackle complex issues, and contribute to projects that shape the future of digital transformation.
   

  

**AI-First. Future-Driven. Human-Centered.**
 At OpenText, AI is at the heart of everything we do—powering innovation, transforming work, and empowering digital knowledge workers. We're hiring talent that AI can't replace to help us shape the future of information management. Join us.
   

  

**What The Role Offers**
* Delivering the sales revenue plan. Achieving or exceeding sales quotas for license, SaaS, maintenance, and services. Growing the business and OpenText´s market share. Responsible for managing costs and discretionary spending, including travel.
* Consultative selling and intensely listening to your customers.
* Preparing comprehensive territory plans.
* Identifying and converting opportunities into sales.
* Skillfully executing each phase of the sales process from pipeline generation to closing the deal.
* Accomplishing client presentations and running effective meetings.
* Clearly articulating the value proposition of solutions and products and the endless possibilities of the digital enterprise to your customers.
* Collaborating across all internal teams and resources and ensuring you bring the best solution to your clients.


**What You Need To Succeed**
* You have a solid track record of B2B selling across the Enterprise.
* You have experience consulting with C-level customers on complex cloud-based, on-premises, or hybrid solutions. You deploy advanced sales methodologies and tools to achieve and exceed your targets.
* You speak English and Swedish fluently.
* A university or bachelor’s degree in combination with several years of enterprise software sales experience and a willingness to travel within the assigned territory.
* You share an intellectual curiosity; you easily grasp new products and solutions, and you bring the spirit of innovation to your customers.


**One last thing**
 If you are passionate about driving business growth and have a proven track record in B2B sales, this role is for you. As a Senior Account Executive at OpenText, you'll have the opportunity to significantly impact our market share in Sweden by delivering innovative EIM solutions to our customers. You'll work with top-level executives, leverage your consultative selling skills, and collaborate with internal teams to provide the best solutions.
